title: Responses from a magazine agent
context: Tell a customer when their new magazine subscription will start.

content.bestLine: Your new subscription will start with the next issue.

neutral.text: The first issue will arrive soon.
You'll receive your first magazine next week.
Your subscription begins with the upcoming issue.
The next issue will be your first one.
You can expect your first magazine in two weeks.
The start date is listed on your receipt.

formal.text: Your subscription will commence with the next available issue.
You will receive your first magazine at the start of the next month.
The initial issue of your subscription will be sent to you shortly.
Your subscription start date is confirmed as the next issue.
Please expect your first magazine to arrive within the next few weeks.
The details of your subscription, including the start date, are outlined in your welcome packet.

patterns.template: Your subscription will start with the [options] issue.
You can expect your first magazine in [options].
patterns.meaning: providing a timeframe for the first issue arrival
